name: Piles (Hemorrhoids)
overview: Piles are swollen veins around the anus or rectum that can cause bleeding, itching, or pain while passing stool. They're very common and often linked to constipation or straining during bowel movements.
whenToConsult: Bleeding during or after passing stool
Pain, swelling, or itching in the anal region
A lump or feeling of something "coming out"
treatmentOptions: Mild piles can often be managed with dietary changes, increased fibre, and medicines. For advanced cases, laser or stapler surgery offers a modern, painless solution. The laser piles procedure is performed under anaesthesia. It seals the swollen veins using focused laser energy without cuts or stitches.
whyChooseUs: We use advanced laser and minimally invasive tools for a faster, safer, and more comfortable recovery — with minimal bleeding and almost no recurrence.

journeySteps.title: Consultation & Diagnosis
journeySteps.description: A detailed check-up and proctoscopy to assess the grade of hemorrhoids and confirm the diagnosis.

journeySteps.title: Personalized Treatment Plan
journeySteps.description: Your doctor discusses options like medication or Laser Hemorrhoidoplasty (LHP) based on severity.

journeySteps.title: Advanced Procedure
journeySteps.description: Laser treatment precisely shrinks the piles with minimal bleeding and faster comfort.

journeySteps.title: Post-Procedure Observation
journeySteps.description: Short observation before discharge with guidance on diet and hygiene.

journeySteps.title: Quick Return to Normal Life
journeySteps.description: Resume regular activities quickly with minimal discomfort.

journeySteps.title: Follow-Up & Complete Care
journeySteps.description: A review ensures perfect healing and advice to prevent recurrence.

name: Hernia (Robotic or Laparoscopic Hernia Repair)
overview: A hernia develops when an internal organ or tissue pushes through a weak spot in the muscle wall, often appearing as a bulge in the abdomen or groin. Hernias don't heal on their own and usually require surgery.
whenToConsult: Visible bulge or swelling in the abdomen or groin
Pain while lifting, coughing, or bending
Discomfort that worsens by the end of the day
treatmentOptions: In Robotic Hernia Repair, the surgeon operates using robotic arms controlled from a console. This allows unmatched precision and flexibility, even for complex or recurrent hernias. A surgical mesh is placed to strengthen the muscle wall. Laparoscopic Hernia Repair, is a keyhole surgery performed through 3 tiny incisions using a camera and fine instruments.
whyChooseUs: Robotic surgery ensures smaller incisions, less pain, faster healing, and better cosmetic results — handled by an experienced surgeon specializing in advanced robotic techniques.

journeySteps.title: Consultation & Diagnosis
journeySteps.description: Examination and imaging identify the hernia site and type.

journeySteps.title: Personalized Treatment Plan
journeySteps.description: Plan includes laparoscopic or robotic mesh repair options.

journeySteps.title: Advanced Procedure
journeySteps.description: Precise surgery restores muscle strength using minimal-access techniques.

journeySteps.title: Post-Procedure Observation
journeySteps.description: Brief hospital stay to monitor comfort and healing.

journeySteps.title: Quick Return to Normal Life
journeySteps.description: Resume walking and light activities within days.

journeySteps.title: Follow-Up & Complete Care
journeySteps.description: Regular check ensures lasting repair and comfort.

name: Gall Bladder Stones (Robotic or Laparoscopic Cholecystectomy)
overview: Gallstones are hardened deposits that form in the gall bladder and can cause severe abdominal pain, nausea, or vomiting after meals. When symptoms are frequent or complications arise, removal of the gall bladder is the safest and most effective treatment.
whenToConsult: Recurrent pain in the upper right abdomen or after fatty meals
History of gallstone attacks or infection (cholecystitis)
treatmentOptions: In Laparoscopic or Robotic Gall Bladder Removal, the surgeon makes 3–4 tiny keyhole incisions to insert a camera and instruments. The gall bladder is safely removed through one of these small cuts. The surgery is performed under general anaesthesia.
whyChooseUs: We perform all gall bladder surgeries using advanced Laparoscopic or Robotic Techniques for minimal pain, faster recovery, and almost invisible scars.

journeySteps.title: Consultation & Diagnosis
journeySteps.description: Ultrasound confirms stones and gall bladder condition.

journeySteps.title: Personalized Treatment Plan
journeySteps.description: Laparoscopic or robotic removal is recommended for permanent relief.

journeySteps.title: Advanced Procedure
journeySteps.description: Tiny keyhole incisions used to remove the gall bladder safely.

journeySteps.title: Post-Procedure Observation
journeySteps.description: Monitored for stability before discharge.

journeySteps.title: Quick Return to Normal Life
journeySteps.description: Minimal scars and fast recovery to regular diet.

journeySteps.title: Follow-Up & Complete Care
journeySteps.description: Review ensures smooth digestion and wound healing

name: Appendicitis (Robotic or Laparoscopic Appendectomy)
overview: Appendicitis occurs when the appendix — a small pouch attached to the large intestine — becomes inflamed or infected. It causes sharp pain in the lower right abdomen, fever, and nausea. If left untreated, it can burst and lead to serious infection.
whenToConsult: Sudden pain in the right lower abdomen
Loss of appetite, nausea, or vomiting
Fever or tenderness in the abdomen
treatmentOptions: The best treatment is surgical removal of the appendix. Robotic or Laparoscopic Appendectomy is a keyhole surgery performed through 3 tiny incisions using a camera and fine instruments. The procedure is done under general anaesthesia.
whyChooseUs: Our laparoscopic approach ensures minimal pain, negligible scarring, and quicker healing — allowing you to resume normal life sooner.

journeySteps.title: Consultation & Diagnosis
journeySteps.description: Physical exam and scans confirm inflammation of the appendix.

journeySteps.title: Personalized Treatment Plan
journeySteps.description: Laparoscopic or robotic surgery advised for safe removal.

journeySteps.title: Advanced Procedure
journeySteps.description: Appendix removed through small incisions under anesthesia.

journeySteps.title: Post-Procedure Observation
journeySteps.description: Short monitoring to ensure comfort before discharge.

journeySteps.title: Quick Return to Normal Life
journeySteps.description: Rapid recovery with minimal pain and scars.

journeySteps.title: Follow-Up & Complete Care
journeySteps.description: Healing review and preventive care guidance.

name: Advanced Thyroid Surgery
overview: Thyroid disorders such as goitre, nodules, or thyroid cancer may require surgical removal of part or all of the thyroid gland. With modern techniques, thyroid surgery is now safer and more precise than ever before.
whenToConsult: Visible swelling in the front of the neck
Hoarseness of voice or thyroid test abnormalities
treatmentOptions: We perform Minimally Invasive Thyroidectomy and Endoscopic/Robotic Thyroid Surgery, which use small incisions and cameras for high precision. The procedure is performed under general anaesthesia.
whyChooseUs: Our advanced approach ensures minimal scarring, reduced pain, and preservation of voice and calcium levels — ensuring both safety and confidence after surgery.

journeySteps.title: Consultation & Diagnosis
journeySteps.description: Ultrasound and tests confirm thyroid disorder.

journeySteps.title: Personalized Treatment Plan
journeySteps.description: Decision on partial or total removal depending on condition.

journeySteps.title: Advanced Procedure
journeySteps.description: Precision surgery protects vital nerves and voice.

journeySteps.title: Post-Procedure Observation
journeySteps.description: Careful monitoring of calcium and thyroid levels.

journeySteps.title: Quick Return to Normal Life
journeySteps.description: Early recovery and return to normal routine.

journeySteps.title: Follow-Up & Complete Care
journeySteps.description: Regular follow-ups for hormone balance and wellness.

name: Breast Surgery
overview: Breast conditions can range from harmless cysts and lumps to infections or even cancer. Early diagnosis and the right treatment can ensure the best possible outcome. We provide comprehensive breast care — from evaluation to surgery — in a safe and supportive environment.
whenToConsult: Lump or swelling in the breast or underarm
Change in shape or skin of the breast
treatmentOptions: Depending on the condition, procedures may include: Lumpectomy (removal of a small lump or cyst), Mastectomy (removal of the whole breast, if needed), Breast abscess drainage, Reconstructive surgery to restore natural shape after cancer surgery. Most breast surgeries are done under general anaesthesia.
whyChooseUs: Our focus is on early diagnosis, precision surgery, and emotional comfort — using advanced techniques to minimize scars and promote faster healing.

journeySteps.title: Consultation & Diagnosis
journeySteps.description: Clinical exam and imaging to assess lumps or concerns.

journeySteps.title: Personalized Treatment Plan
journeySteps.description: Tailored plan for removal, reconstruction, or correction.

journeySteps.title: Advanced Procedure
journeySteps.description: Safe and precise surgery with cosmetic focus.

journeySteps.title: Post-Procedure Observation
journeySteps.description: Brief stay for pain control and monitoring.

journeySteps.title: Quick Return to Normal Life
journeySteps.description: Smooth recovery with minimal scarring.

journeySteps.title: Follow-Up & Complete Care
journeySteps.description: Follow-up ensures healing and confidence restoration.

name: Diabetic Foot
overview: People with diabetes often experience poor blood circulation and reduced sensation in their feet. This can lead to slow-healing wounds, ulcers, or infections that, if ignored, can become serious. Early and expert care can prevent complications and even save the limb.
whenToConsult: Persistent wounds or ulcers on the foot
Change in skin colour or temperature
treatmentOptions: At our clinic, diabetic foot care begins with a thorough assessment of blood flow, nerve function, and wound condition. Depending on the severity, treatment may include: Advanced wound dressings and offloading techniques, Laser-assisted wound healing, Minor debridement or surgical cleaning of infected tissue, Reconstructive procedures for deeper infections or ulcers.
whyChooseUs: We combine surgical expertise with diabetic wound management, ensuring faster healing, infection control, and prevention of recurrence. Our approach is comprehensive — treating both the wound and its root cause.

journeySteps.title: Consultation & Diagnosis
journeySteps.description: Foot wounds or ulcers evaluated with tests for blood flow and infection.

journeySteps.title: Personalized Treatment Plan
journeySteps.description: Includes cleaning, antibiotics, dressings, and sugar control.

journeySteps.title: Advanced Procedure
journeySteps.description: Surgical or minor repair if needed for faster healing.

journeySteps.title: Post-Procedure Observation
journeySteps.description: Monitoring wound healing and foot protection.

journeySteps.title: Quick Return to Normal Life
journeySteps.description: Gradual return to mobility with special footwear advice.

journeySteps.title: Follow-Up & Complete Care
journeySteps.description: Regular wound checks to prevent recurrence.

name: Intestinal Surgeries (Bowel Obstruction / Colostomy / Laparotomy)
overview: Serious intestinal conditions such as bowel obstruction, perforation, or complicated infections require timely surgical intervention. These conditions can cause severe abdominal pain, vomiting, bloating, and even life-threatening complications if left untreated. Modern laparoscopic or open surgeries allow safe correction of the problem, restoring bowel function while minimizing pain, scarring, and hospital stay.
whenToConsult: Vomiting, bloating, inability to pass stool
treatmentOptions: Laparoscopic lysis, colostomy, or open laparotomy; surgery lasts 1–3 hours under general anaesthesia.
whyChooseUs: Minimally invasive options reduce pain, hospital stay, and recovery time.

journeySteps.title: Consultation & Diagnosis
journeySteps.description: Imaging and lab tests.

journeySteps.title: Personalized Treatment Plan
journeySteps.description: Laparoscopic or open surgery planned.

journeySteps.title: Advanced Procedure
journeySteps.description: Correct intestinal issue safely.

journeySteps.title: Post-Procedure Care
journeySteps.description: Diet and wound care guidance.

journeySteps.title: Quick Return to Normal Life
journeySteps.description: Resume normal diet and light activities under guidance.

journeySteps.title: Follow-Up & Support
journeySteps.description: Monitor bowel function and prevent complications.

name: Burn Injuries
overview: Burns damage skin and underlying tissue, causing pain, swelling, and risk of infection. Superficial burns heal with proper wound care, while deep burns may require skin grafting. Early intervention reduces scarring and prevents complications. burn care includes wound cleaning, dressings, debridement and other concerned surgeries and reconstructive procedures
whenToConsult: Burns on sensitive areas (face, hands, feet, genitals)
treatmentOptions: Wound cleaning, dressings, laser-assisted healing, and skin grafting if needed
whyChooseUs: Advanced burn care ensures infection control, faster healing, and minimized scarring.

journeySteps.title: Consultation & Diagnosis
journeySteps.description: Assess burn depth and area.

journeySteps.title: Personalized Treatment Plan
journeySteps.description: Dressings, grafting, or laser therapy.

journeySteps.description: Wound cleaning and healing support.

journeySteps.description: Dressings, hydration, and scar management.

journeySteps.title: Quick Return to Normal Life
journeySteps.description: Gradually resume daily activities as pain and dressings allow.

journeySteps.title: Follow-Up & Support
journeySteps.description: Monitor healing and cosmetic restoration.

name: Fissure (Laser Treatment)
overview: An anal fissure is a small tear in the lining of the anus, usually caused by constipation or hard stool. It can cause severe pain and a burning sensation while passing stool.
whenToConsult: Sharp pain and burning during bowel movements
Fear of passing stool due to pain
treatmentOptions: Initial management includes stool softeners, pain-relief creams, and warm water sitz baths. If it becomes chronic, Laser Sphincterotomy is a simple and effective solution. Laser is used to relax the tight muscle and promote healing of the tear — without cuts, stitches, or much bleeding.
whyChooseUs: We focus on quick relief and lasting cure with minimal pain using the latest laser technology.

journeySteps.title: Consultation & Diagnosis
journeySteps.description: A careful rectal examination to confirm the fissure and rule out infection.

journeySteps.title: Personalized Treatment Plan
journeySteps.description: Treatment options like medicines or laser are discussed for lasting relief.

journeySteps.title: Advanced Procedure
journeySteps.description: Laser procedure helps the fissure heal without cuts or stitches.

journeySteps.title: Post-Procedure Observation
journeySteps.description: Brief monitoring before discharge with diet and care instructions.

journeySteps.title: Quick Return to Normal Life
journeySteps.description: Minimal pain and early return to daily routine.

journeySteps.title: Follow-Up & Complete Care
journeySteps.description: Follow-up ensures smooth healing and lifestyle tips to prevent recurrence.

name: Fistula Treatment
overview: An anal fistula is a small tunnel that forms between the anal canal and the skin near the anus, often after an infection or abscess. It can cause pain, discharge, or swelling around the anal area.
whenToConsult: Recurrent pus discharge near the anus
Pain or swelling that worsens on sitting
treatmentOptions: The best solution is Laser Fistula Treatment (FiLaC technique) or Video-Assisted Anal Fistula Treatment (VAAFT). These minimally invasive procedures remove the infected tract without cutting the sphincter muscle, reducing the risk of incontinence. The surgery is performed under anaesthesia.
whyChooseUs: Our advanced laser techniques ensure minimal pain, faster healing, and a low recurrence rate, all while preserving normal bowel control.

journeySteps.title: Consultation & Diagnosis
journeySteps.description: A clinical exam and imaging confirm the fistula tract.

journeySteps.title: Personalized Treatment Plan
journeySteps.description: Plan includes laser, VAAFT, or other advanced techniques for your case.

journeySteps.title: Advanced Procedure
journeySteps.description: Laser sealing or minimal-access surgery clears infection while preserving control.

journeySteps.title: Post-Procedure Observation
journeySteps.description: Observation for comfort and dressing instructions.

journeySteps.title: Quick Return to Normal Life
journeySteps.description: Resume routine activities within a short period.

journeySteps.title: Follow-Up & Complete Care
journeySteps.description: Regular check-ups to ensure full healing and prevent recurrence.

name: Pilonidal Sinus
overview: A pilonidal sinus is a small cyst or tunnel under the skin near the tailbone, often caused by ingrown hair and infection. It can cause swelling, pain, or pus discharge. If not treated properly, it may keep recurring.
whenToConsult: Swelling or pain near the tailbone
treatmentOptions: We use Laser Pilonidal Sinus Treatment or Minimally Invasive Excision, depending on the case. The infected tract is gently removed or sealed using a laser, with minimal tissue damage and no stitches. The surgery is done under anaesthesia.
whyChooseUs: Our laser-assisted care ensures faster healing, minimal pain, and a clean, scar-free result — helping you return to normal life quickly and comfortably.

journeySteps.title: Consultation & Diagnosis
journeySteps.description: Inspection and tests confirm sinus tract.

journeySteps.title: Personalized Treatment Plan
journeySteps.description: Laser or minimal-access method chosen for you.

journeySteps.title: Advanced Procedure
journeySteps.description: Laser seals the tract with minimal incision.

journeySteps.title: Post-Procedure Observation
journeySteps.description: Short rest and dressing advice given.

journeySteps.title: Quick Return to Normal Life
journeySteps.description: Resume activities within days.

journeySteps.title: Follow-Up & Complete Care
journeySteps.description: Check-up ensures complete healing and prevents recurrence.

name: Rectal Prolapse
overview: Rectal prolapse occurs when a part of the rectum slips out of its normal position, often protruding through the anus. It can cause discomfort, bleeding, mucus discharge, or difficulty controlling bowel movements. Though not life-threatening, it can affect daily comfort and confidence.
whenToConsult: A feeling or visible bulge coming out during bowel movements
Discomfort or pain while sitting or walking
treatmentOptions: Rectal prolapse is best treated with Laparoscopic or Robotic Rectopexy, a minimally invasive surgery that repositions and secures the rectum in its place. The surgery is performed under general anaesthesia. Depending on the patient's age and health, either a perineal (lower) or abdominal approach may be used.
whyChooseUs: We specialize in minimally invasive and robotic techniques that offer less pain, faster recovery, and a much lower chance of recurrence — restoring comfort and normal bowel function.

journeySteps.title: Consultation & Diagnosis
journeySteps.description: Physical and imaging tests confirm prolapse severity.

journeySteps.title: Personalized Treatment Plan
journeySteps.description: Laparoscopic or perineal repair discussed.

journeySteps.title: Advanced Procedure
journeySteps.description: Repair done safely under anesthesia to restore anatomy.

journeySteps.title: Post-Procedure Observation
journeySteps.description: Careful monitoring of bowel movements.

journeySteps.title: Quick Return to Normal Life
journeySteps.description: Resume regular diet and movement soon.

journeySteps.title: Follow-Up & Complete Care
journeySteps.description: Follow-up ensures lasting results and comfort.

name: Phimosis
overview: Phimosis is a condition where the foreskin of the penis cannot be fully retracted, which may lead to pain, hygiene issues, or infection. It's common in both children and adults and can be easily treated with modern surgical techniques.
whenToConsult: Difficulty or pain while retracting the foreskin
Pain during urination or sexual activity
treatmentOptions: Depending on severity, options include: Topical medications (for mild cases), Circumcision — surgical removal of the foreskin, done using conventional, laser, or stapler techniques. The procedure is done under local or general anaesthesia and is completely safe.
whyChooseUs: Our clinic offers painless, quick, and precise circumcision using the latest laser and stapler techniques, ensuring hygiene, comfort, and minimal scarring.

journeySteps.title: Consultation & Diagnosis
journeySteps.description: Examination confirms tight foreskin and symptoms.

journeySteps.title: Personalized Treatment Plan
journeySteps.description: Circumcision or preputioplasty discussed.

journeySteps.description: Short observation before discharge.

journeySteps.title: Quick Return to Normal Life
journeySteps.description: Minimal discomfort and easy healing.

journeySteps.title: Follow-Up & Complete Care
journeySteps.description: Follow-up ensures smooth recovery and hygiene.

name: Hydrocele
overview: A hydrocele is a painless swelling around the testicle caused by fluid buildup. It's common in adult men and can cause heaviness or discomfort. While harmless in most cases, a large hydrocele may require surgical correction.
whenToConsult: Swelling or heaviness in the scrotum
Increase in scrotal size over time
treatmentOptions: Hydrocelectomy is a simple surgical procedure performed under anaesthesia to drain the fluid and remove the sac that causes the swelling.
whyChooseUs: We use modern, minimally invasive Robotic and Laparoscopic techniques to ensure quick recovery, minimal scarring, and lasting comfort.

journeySteps.title: Consultation & Diagnosis
journeySteps.description: Ultrasound confirms fluid collection around the testicle.

journeySteps.description: Small incision used to drain and remove the sac.

journeySteps.description: Short recovery monitoring before discharge.

journeySteps.title: Quick Return to Normal Life
journeySteps.description: Minimal discomfort and fast return to work.

journeySteps.title: Follow-Up & Complete Care
journeySteps.description: Review for proper healing and comfort.

name: Cyst & Lipoma Removal
overview: Cysts are non-cancerous lumps that can form anywhere on the body — commonly on the scalp, face, or back. While usually harmless, they may grow, get infected, or cause cosmetic concern. Surgical removal provides a permanent cure.
whenToConsult: Visible or growing lump under the skin
treatmentOptions: Under local anaesthesia, the cyst and its sac are completely removed through a small incision. For deeper cysts or cosmetic areas, laser or minimally invasive removal is used to avoid scarring.
whyChooseUs: We offer precise, scar-minimizing cyst removal using modern surgical and laser techniques — ensuring safety, hygiene, and great cosmetic results.

name: Abscess Drainage
overview: An abscess is a painful, pus-filled swelling that develops due to infection under the skin. If not treated early, it can spread to nearby tissues or cause fever. Prompt drainage helps relieve pain and prevents complications.
whenToConsult: Painful lump with redness, warmth, or swelling
treatmentOptions: Abscess drainage is a simple surgical procedure done under local or general anaesthesia. The infected area is opened, pus is drained, and the cavity is cleaned. A small dressing or drain may be placed to allow further discharge to escape.
whyChooseUs: We ensure safe, sterile, and gentle abscess management with minimal scarring and complete infection control.

journeySteps.title: Consultation & Diagnosis
journeySteps.description: Examination confirms pus collection or infection.

journeySteps.title: Personalized Treatment Plan

name: Wart Treatment
overview: Warts are skin growths caused by human papillomavirus (HPV). They can appear on hands, feet, or other areas, causing discomfort or cosmetic concerns. Early treatment prevents spread and persistent growth. Laser removal, cryotherapy, or minor surgery ensures precise, effective, and minimally invasive treatment.
treatmentOptions: Laser removal, cryotherapy, or minor surgery. Procedure takes 10–20 minutes under local anaesthesia.
whyChooseUs: Safe, precise, and quick removal with minimal scarring.

journeySteps.description: Identify wart type and cause.

name: Ingrown Toenail Infection & Removal
overview: Ingrown toenails occur when the nail grows into the surrounding skin, causing pain, swelling, and infection. Recurrent ingrown nails can limit mobility and affect daily activities. Partial nail avulsion or nail bed correction relieves pain and prevents recurrence.
whenToConsult: Redness, pain, or pus near the nail
treatmentOptions: Partial nail avulsion or nail bed correction under local anaesthesia; lasts 20–30 minutes.
whyChooseUs: Minimally invasive removal ensures quick healing and prevents recurrence.

journeySteps.description: Examine nail and infection severity.

name: Testicle or Ovarian Torsion
overview: Torsion occurs when the testicle or ovary twists, cutting off blood supply. It is a medical emergency that causes severe pain, swelling, and can lead to loss of the organ if untreated. Immediate surgical intervention restores blood flow and preserves organ function, often saving fertility and reducing long-term complications.
whenToConsult: Sudden, severe lower abdominal or groin pain
treatmentOptions: Emergency detorsion surgery; procedure lasts 45–60 minutes under general anaesthesia.
whyChooseUs: Immediate intervention preserves organ function and reduces complications.

journeySteps.description: Emergency ultrasound and assessment.

name: Trauma Surgery (Abdomen Trauma)
overview: Abdominal trauma from accidents or injuries can cause internal bleeding or organ damage. Prompt surgical evaluation is essential to prevent life-threatening complications. Modern laparoscopic or open exploratory surgeries allow accurate assessment and repair of damaged tissues, minimizing pain and promoting faster recovery.
treatmentOptions: Laparoscopic or open exploratory surgery; 1–3 hours under general anaesthesia..
whyChooseUs: Rapid, precise trauma care minimizes complications and preserves organ function.

name: Lymph Node Excision
overview: Enlarged or suspicious lymph nodes may indicate infection, inflammation, or malignancy. Excision of the lymph node allows accurate diagnosis and treatment, preventing complications and guiding further care. Minimally invasive techniques ensure precise removal with minimal scarring.
whenToConsult: Painless swelling in neck, armpit, or groin
Fever, night sweats, or weight loss
treatmentOptions: Excision under local or general anaesthesia
whyChooseUs: Safe, precise removal with accurate diagnostic results.

name: Cellulitis
overview: Cellulitis is a bacterial skin infection that causes redness, swelling, warmth, and pain. Without prompt treatment, it can spread rapidly and cause serious complications. Early diagnosis and treatment with antibiotics or minor surgical interventions ensure safe recovery and prevent recurrence.
treatmentOptions: Antibiotics or minor drainage; severe cases may require IV therapy or surgical cleaning.
recoveryTime: Most patients recover in 7–10 days with timely treatment.
whyChooseUs: Expert infection management ensures quick healing and prevents complications.

journeySteps.description: Examine infection severity.

journeySteps.title: Personalized Treatment Plan
journeySteps.description: Oral, IV, or minor drainage.

name: Varicose Vein Treatment
overview: Varicose veins are enlarged, twisted veins that commonly appear on the legs due to weakened valves and poor blood circulation. They may cause heaviness, swelling, aching, or visible bulging veins. If left untreated, they can progress to skin discoloration, ulcers, and clot formation. Modern minimally invasive treatments like laser ablation and sclerotherapy offer safe, effective, and cosmetically pleasing results with minimal pain and downtime.
treatmentOptions: Laser ablation, sclerotherapy, or minimally invasive vein closure; takes 30–60 minutes, done under local anaesthesia.
whyChooseUs: Advanced techniques ensure painless treatment, excellent cosmetic results, and long-term relief.

name: Video Proctoscopy (VAAFT / Diagnostic Proctoscopy)
overview: Video proctoscopy is an advanced, high-definition examination of the anal canal and rectum used to diagnose conditions like piles, fissures, fistulas, rectal bleeding, and infections. Unlike regular proctoscopy, the video-based system provides a clearer, magnified view that helps diagnose issues early and plan precise treatments. It is a quick, painless, outpatient procedure.
treatmentOptions: A high-resolution camera is inserted gently to examine the anal canal; procedure takes 5–10 minutes with no anaesthesia needed.
whyChooseUs: Accurate diagnosis using advanced video equipment ensures targeted, effective treatment plans.

journeySteps.description: Immediate results and treatment suggestions.

journeySteps.description: Resume activities instantly.

name: Corn Removal
overview: Corns are thick, hardened areas of skin that develop due to repeated pressure or friction, usually on the feet or toes. They can cause sharp pain while walking or wearing shoes. If not managed, they may become infected or lead to deeper tissue irritation. Surgical corn removal is a quick and effective procedure, ensuring long-lasting relief and preventing recurrence.
whenToConsult: Painful hard bump on foot or toe
treatmentOptions: Minimally invasive surgical shaving or excision under local anaesthesia; takes 10–20 minutes.
whyChooseUs: Precise removal ensures minimal discomfort, fast healing, and long-term relief.

journeySteps.title: Consultation & Diagnosis

name: General Physician
overview: Our General Physician services provide comprehensive primary medical care for patients of all ages. We focus on accurate diagnosis through detailed history-taking, thorough examination, and evidence-based decision-making. From common illnesses to chronic disease management, we ensure seamless care and guide you through every step of your treatment.
whenToConsult: Fever, infections, cough, cold, sore throat
Regular health check-ups and preventive care
Any health concern where you are unsure which specialist to consult

Personalized Treatment – Medicines, lifestyle guidance, counseling, and preventive care. 4. Monitoring & Adjustment – Treatment updated based on your progress and test results.
whyChooseUs: 10+ years of clinical experience with strong diagnostic skills. Thorough examination & attentive listening to every patient. One-point contact from first consultation to recovery.
